titles: A mery nevv iigge. Or, The pleasant wooing betwixt Kit and Pegge. To the tune of Strawberry leaues make maidens faire.
author: Hamdultun, Valentine.
notes: In two parts, separated for mounting, each with woodcut at head; part 2 has caption title: Now here doth follow a pleasant new song betweene two young louers that lasted not long.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
